answer: I'd suggest you get a cheap GSM phone assuming you're not lucky enough to have a GSM phone already and then pick up a pre pay PAYG sim card when you get to spain. This will also have the bonus of giving you a Spanish number for the duration of your trip so people in Spain can call you for a sensible amount of money. If you only want data you may wish to get an unlocked 3g usb dongle and then pick up a PAYG sim card for it that could potentially be cheaper than doing it via a phone.
